title: The Unholy Cult of Teemoism- Dislike to Fuel Teemo's Coming/Comment to Keep the Fuel Coming
body:
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ct8kmppUIAEMLzN.jpg

For every dislike, Teemo is fueled. For every comment telling a story about how Teemo stole your soul in-game (or out), Teemo is fueled. 
**We must empower the king to ready his coming!**

replies.body: Get the right trinket and those shrooms are basically free gold

Every f*ing single time I played against him.
Every F*ing single I died because of him.
Every F*ing single time I stepped on a shroom.
I always knew the truth.
If you downvote, you are fueling Devil Teemo. If you upvote, you are upvoting a Teemo main and giving the thread more potential for downvotes. Either way, EVIL FINDS A WAY!
I lost my soul when I decided to become a Teemo main after seeing the upcoming skin.

this one time on hexa kill...   i was playing jinx, there was a teemo (0/7/2) on my team that was just running around the enemy jgl.  i ran up to the team fight after spawning, my ulty got me a tripple, i ran 2 others down, i was about to last hit the blitz...   shroom killed him.
